website_summaries.verdict: An economical choice for family and recreational use, its range may be too limited for larger environments or areas with trees or other obstacles.
pros: Radios’ range is as advertised at just under 2 miles, with clear reception, users find
Price point means radios can be replaced affordably if lost or broken
cons: Shared channel change and power button can be frustrating to use
Some users have trouble with crosstalk on shared frequencies
A few reports of poor range, or radios not working at all

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars, over and out
customer_reviews.text: These walkie talkies worked great while on a cruise. Good sound quality and simple to use. The batteries lasted the entire week of the cruise and still shows full battery. And they may be a little bulky, but they fit comfortable in my pocket. I'm sure I'll find uses for them elsewhere too. The only negatives would be that each device uses 3 AA batteries, and that putting it in lock mode doesn't really seem to lock the buttons.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ruhl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a cruise
customer_reviews.text: Used them on a cruise and they worked wonderfully all over the huge ship! We were in constant contact with the whole family. No worries on missing family members.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME! Must have for a cruise
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME! Must have for a cruise!! We could hear each other all over the boat loud and clear. And these babies don't eat up batteries! We left these on for the entire 7 day cruise and never needed to change the batteries!
customer_reviews.author: abby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent range for price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent range for price. Good quality. My kids take these with them on bike rides and I keep one at the house and can talk to them and know where they are. Have not measured the exact distance they can go, but know it's lots of blocks behind us in another neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: T Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dime
customer_reviews.text: I bought these so I could keep in contact with my children while they played out in the backyard on an acre+ lot. Everyone loves these! Good clarity if I can get the kids to slow down and give each other air time. The clip is decent and holds on to even thin material. The only downside is that small children seem to change the channel easily, but even mine have figured out how to avoid that! Would be perfect for allowing some children to exercise some independence while allowing their grown-ups to keep tabs on them
customer_reviews.author: JunieCakes

customer_reviews.title: Maybe they would work better in the city/suburbs but we bought these to take ...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe they would work better in the city/suburbs but we bought these to take camping and they don't have good range at all. We were very disappointed because where we camp cell phones don't work. I didn't think it was fair to give it fewer stars because it may work much better when not in a park setting, but still took a few stars off since they didn't perform how we were hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: quality product.
customer_reviews.text: santa brought these for my daughter and she LOVES them. easy to use. clear sounding, great range around the neighborhood and good price. i think i’ll get more so the cousins can join in the action. we take them to the park and they do “missions” etc with them. lol. oh yeah, one even fell in a pond. we immediate took it out and took batteries out and let it dry for 2 days and it powered back on. i’d give 6 stars if i could.
customer_reviews.author: aunty ak

customer_reviews.title: they worked pretty well. We went on the oasis of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Once my friends and I got the hang of using these, they worked pretty well. We went on the oasis of the sea’s for Royal Caribbean, which is one of their biggest boats. If I had to take a guess I would say that the walkie-talkies worked about 80% of the time. Photos accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work on cruise ships
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our cruise and almost never heard anything if we were separated by more than 15 or 20 feet, certainly not between cabins but not even when outside on the same deck. The price is what drew us to these but if they don't work they are not worth the cheap price.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Brewer

customer_reviews.title: No Good
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, these did not work. On a full battery charge, they worked intermittently. One second I could get a transmission through and then the next it wouldn't go through. I played around with them for 2 days to see if it was user error or would correct itself, but I couldn't get them to work consistently.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaGirl

customer_reviews.title: You can't get far from each other before you loose ...
customer_reviews.text: You can't get far from each other before you loose signal. My husband and I tried to use on the Triump Cruise ship; our room was on the 6th floor and I went to the 5th floor - No signal. Returned them; not for distant.
customer_reviews.author: Anne H.

customer_reviews.title: poor quality and didn't always work
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if the build quality has gone down, but I was very disappointed with these walkie talkies. I put in batteries and they'd work for a little bit and then stop. I'm guessing poor battery connections, but this was across multiple devices. Just plain unacceptable if you ask me. These are going to be returned right away.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lau

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment is an understatement
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a family cruise because of the great reviews and 3 mi reach. They worked fine while we were in our rooms (next door to each other) but as soon as we went anywhere on the ship apart from each other it was absolute garbage. When I went on a diving excursion 2 mi out from the boat and couldn’t reach my family. Almost missed the boats pull time and couldn’t reach my family. They thought I had been kidnapped or not going to make the ship. My wife and mother were in tears when I finally got back. I would not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper then a cell phone 😜
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them & uses them for play games around the house or when he rides to that park we can still communicate and he can check in with me.
customer_reviews.author: Ahedricks

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PERFORMANCE
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed at the reception of these cheap walky-talkies. I ordered amother set to have as standbys. They are better than the expensive Motorolas of a few years back.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: They thought it was so awesome. They are still working great after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: These work amazingly!!! we had it for family trip. The cousins could speak to each other while we were driving. They thought it was so awesome. They are still working great after 6 months
customer_reviews.author: Brandi piper

customer_reviews.title: If you do buy these I would recommend buying rechargeable batteries
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use around the house. The batteries die in them within days. If you do buy these I would recommend buying rechargeable batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Nfbg6208

customer_reviews.title: Works good for fun
customer_reviews.text: One set works great, the second set however one of the walkie talkies got too hot to touch and the screen fogged over. It was a bit scary, I removed the batteries as fast as possible. It’s been about 5 minutes now and the walkie talkie is still too hot to touch. I’m glad I caught this before I handed them over to the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Better than the ones I had as a kid
customer_reviews.text: purchased these for my nephews on Christmas they had really good range and were of good quality. You could easily understand what the person on other end was saying.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Complicated, but Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for fun around the house, and it works pretty well. It is a very complicated set of walkie talkies but after a few rounds of reading the instructions I got it to go pretty smooth. The VOX setting was very confusing and after a while of fiddling we decided to not use it, since we could not get it to work. Despite those negatives, it was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Richard

customer_reviews.title: Okay in quiet environments
customer_reviews.text: Bought these with the intention to use them at business events. Audio isn't all that clear and we ended up just using the alert noise to walk over and talk to each other
customer_reviews.author: MBLAQ

customer_reviews.title: 4 packs. Good for couple camps then does not work
customer_reviews.text: We used it for couple outings. Then they stopped working. High usage of AA batteries. 2 stars for the quality
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: They work, but ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely poor directions for settings; not user intuitive. It took three rocket scientists to figure it out. Obnoxiously loud ringtone, and we didn't know how to reduce volume. Ate up AA batteries like candy.
customer_reviews.author: SansingHHI

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart (antenna) for our kids rather quickly with minimal use (at airport and around the house). I would recommend paying more for a recognizable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: 50,000 sq. Ft.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the top 4 leads in each department in my plastics factory including myself and they work great. We are spread out over about 50,000 square feet of warehouse and I can hear each person just fine. My pocket clip broke off the back but otherwise they still work great.
customer_reviews.author: KOSAL

customer_reviews.title: Short battery life and short distance, but fine for casual use
customer_reviews.text: The walkies work fine over short distances, but fade quickly and burn through batteries like a bear at a buffet.
customer_reviews.author: Brit Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know if these would be a good quality but bought them as a gift. The quality is very good and they loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Nah!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for a cruise and they did not work very well.

customer_reviews.title: I love them.
customer_reviews.text: Now my son has no excuse when we call him upstairs. I love them.

customer_reviews.title: 3 out of 4 work ok....# 4 won't turn on!
customer_reviews.text: One of the devices will not turn on at all. Bad customer service, Amazon won't allow me to say anything else. Going to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: David Nichols

customer_reviews.title: OMG This was awesome. Loud and clear and over long distance
customer_reviews.text: OMG This was awesome. Loud and clear and over long distance. Easy to use and to install batteries, no screwdrivers needed vs toy walkie talkies, and good quality. My daughter loved it and my 3 other nephews as well, playing in the house, they have a lot of fun.

customer_reviews.title: The signal was iffy and way better suited for kids playing than grown ups needing it ...
customer_reviews.text: I took it camping and it was not reliable. The signal was iffy and way better suited for kids playing than grown ups needing it for safety

customer_reviews.title: Great value!

customer_reviews.text: these are the best walkie talkies ever my dad went around the entire block of my apartment complex and the signal never dropped .. would repurchase if anything :D

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my son
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son to play with, one of the gifts that he is still using months after Xmas excellent quality decent range for the money!

customer_reviews.title: For fun or for business!
customer_reviews.text: Gandkids love them. They just moved to a two story home and can't live without them. I also sent a large pack of AA batteries so they won't run out for a while.

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed that they didn't
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression these came with a charging base. I'm disappointed that they didn't. I'm sure when I purchased these the listing included the charging base. They work well. Not loud enough for music festivals.

customer_reviews.title: so I am glad we brought rechargable ones
customer_reviews.text: Took these on my Norwegian cruise hoping to communicate with my family on the ship. They didn't work over about 5 staterooms down. Battery drained quickly as well, so I am glad we brought rechargable ones. Overall seem like a good product for other purposes, but cruising with these was a bust.

customer_reviews.text: I have only used 2 of the 4 but so far they work well. My son and I been having fun with them. Easy to use for a 7yrs old.

customer_reviews.title: I tried using these at a campground and quickly found ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried using these at a campground and quickly found that they stopped working before my friends and I were even 100 yards apart, even when we could clearly see each other and hear each other yelling. This was on open, flat ground with only tents (no buildings or cars) between us. The advertised range of 3-5km is grossly overstated.

product_meta.title: Floureon 4 Packs 22-Channel FRS/GMRS Two Way Radios Up to 3000M/1.9MI Range (MAX 5000M/3.1MI) Handheld Walkie Talkies for Outdoor Adventure (Red)
product_meta.description: Rechargeable Floureon 4 Packs 22-Channel FRS/GMRS Two Way Radios Up to 3000M/1.9MI Range (MAX 5000M/3.1MI) Handheld Walkie Talkies with Batteries
feature_bullets: Warranty: All Floureon walkie talkies have 1 year warranty, 100% satisfaction and zero hassle returns guaranteed.
Channel: 22 channels with PMR system, simple and fun to use (No batteries included). LCD backlit display, battery status indicator.
Range: Up to 3000m/1.9mi (MAX 3.1mi in open field). Adverse weather, car(Iron material), voyage and buildings(yard, street) will affect the range. Adjusting power to 1W will be helpful.
Sound: Good sound quality with adjustable volume level. Stay connected with friends and families.
Application: Great for supermarket, shopping center, festivals, hiking, hunting and any outdoor activities.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars443 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
